data.title: James Wilkinson Obituary
data.meta_description: Obituary for James Arthur Wilkinson | James Arthur Wilkinson, 76, of Durham, CT passed away on February 13, 2023. Born on March 4, 1946 ...
data.meta_site_name: James Wilkinson Obituary | February 13, 2023 | Middletown, CT
data.text:
James Arthur Wilkinson, 76, of Durham, CT passed away on February 13, 2023. Born on March 4, 1946 in Meriden, CT, Jim was a Machinist, Veteran of the Vietnam War, and enjoyed humor and coffee. He will be lovingly remembered by his children, Gabriel Wilkinson, Jaclyn Wilkinson, and Kiera Malowitz and her husband Phil; his sisters Laurel, LuAnn, Linda, and Lori; and his many nieces, nephews, and grandchildren.

Calling hours will be held on Friday, February 24th from 5-7:00 pm at Doolittle Funeral Home, 14 Old Church Street, Middletown, CT. In lieu of flowers, the family asks that you please donate to your local Veterans’ association. To send condolences, please visit www.doolittlefuneralservice.com.
